head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GYHRA, ROGER JOSEPH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GYHRA, ROGER JOSEPH

block.p: GYHRA-Roger Joseph, 56, of The Works and The Break, died Sunday, July 2, 2000. Funeral services will be held at Walter B. CookeKennedy Funeral Home, 117 W. 72 St., NYC, July 6th, 7PM. Friends will be received on Wednesday and Thursday, July 5 and 6, 2-9PM. Memorials may be made to the American Cancer Society.
